properties.title: Access to the sastern river from south
properties.info:
Access to the eastern river from south.
The map shows a widening on the east at and just before the bridge
starts. The widened area then hits a boundary on its eastern side.
A key point is that the river meets the access.
There used to be a minor beach t

properties.title: Access to eastern river from north
properties.info:
As above. Note that the map does not show a fence/boundary.
Note that here there was not previously a fence.
Before there was a small beach here. The route is now blocked with
wood/barbed wire fence.

properties.title: Access to the woods
properties.info:
The map shows that there are no barriers preventing access to the woods.
In section 4 (including above its river) we see boundaries narrowing.No
new fences have been raised over the bridge, it is as it was and quite
natural.

properties.title: Access/beach on north eastern side
properties.info:
There is a narrow beach. Access is now somewhat hampered by the new
fence on the northern face of the road leading to the ford.
There is also a rope barrier across the river which may block the
northern end of the beach. The beach is very narrow here but
